‘Kupas was more than just a teacher and master of the magical arts. He was also an extremely wise and intelligent man.
‘One day, he said to me, “Some day evil will return to this land. And when it does...
‘“...the magical abilities of one of my descendants will identify them as the heir of a great sage. This will place them in terrible danger.”

‘Fearing for the safety of his kin, Master Kupas came to a momentous decision.<page>‘With a potent incantation, he would transfer his great powers to my own family line in an attempt to hide the truth from the world.
‘Once the fateful ritual had been performed and Master Kupas stood bereft of his magical powers, he turned and left without another word.
‘Desperately, I tried to follow him, but he had vanished without a trace, and I never saw his face again.’

I am one of the seven sages. With the Godbird Empyrea's help we were able to seal away the Dark Lord Rhapthorne.

It is conceivable that, many years from now,
his shadow may rise again to darken the world once more.
And so I have carved the story of our friend and ally Empyrea here, so that future generations may know and understand.
The Godbird Empyrea travels between worlds.
She visits these worlds to warn of the threat posed by the Lord of Darkness.
Upon hearing her tale, we seven sages pledged to stand and fight alongside her.
With Empyrea's guidance, we were able to fashion a magical sceptre. A sceptre with the power to imprison the Dark Lord's evil soul.
So began the battle. In the end, the sceptre, empowered by the commingling of our seven bloodlines, was able to entrap Rhapthorne.

Empyrea watches over us from on high.
Look to her if evil rears its ugly head again.
